subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Mikaela Shiffrin, 18, of the United States, and two Austrians, Anna Fenninger, 24, and Matthias Mayer, 23, are among the racers who have changed the landscape.
snippet: Mikaela Shiffrin, 18, of the United States, and two Austrians, Anna Fenninger, 24, and Matthias Mayer, 23, are among the racers who have changed the landscape.
